WorkItem.Description: The Vibrant Alchemist Stone is one of the new trinkets alchemists can make. Previously they could only make one with stamina. In Rawr b4.0.19, the Vibrant Alchemist Stone is described like the old stone, i.e., with +301 Stam insead of +301 Int). I haven't checked the other new trinkets.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Vibrant Alchemist Stone has wrong stats

Comments.Message: Please list the item id's for the other versions of the item (unless it's a random enchant type of thing) so we can add them to the default cache. If it's a random enchant then this is a duplicate issue to the random enchant issue.

Lifebound Alchemist Stone: 58483
Quicksilver Alchemist Stone: 68776
Vibrant Alchemist Stone: 68777
Volatile Alchemist Stone: 68775
